root: ^Ahhh that's the stuff. The only thing that takes me back to my childhood like Beholderite does is a nice cold brew.
^How are you so relaxed? We barely got out of there alive!
^You learn some things when you're alive for hundreds of years. I won't be able to save us next time though.
^Hmmm. Ok well we might need some extra help, and not just with the lad that stole our compass.
^Whoever has that Beholderite probably has it guarded. Shall we ask someone in the tavern to assist us?

Brute: ^Good choice, Folkvar. Do you want to do the talking? I usually scare guys like him away.
Folkvar_talks_to_Brute: ^What do you want, preppy little man?
^We would like to hire your services
Brute_likes_beholderite: ^BEHOLDERITE?! I WILL DESTROY ANYONE WHO COMES BETWEEN ME AND BEHOLDERITE!!! WHERE IS IT?!
Brute_prostitute: ^You think I'm some kind of prostitute or something? That's stereotyping!
Resort_to_monk: ^Yeah, that other guy seemed a little crazy. Let's go talk to the bald one.
Iv_shows_power: ^What? What have you done to me? I'm suddenly so weak!
^I will remind you that first, I must ask my father for permission to commence the bashing of skulls.
Netrixi_asks_Iv_why_here: ^I am a monk from the mountains to the East looking for my brother. I am looking for help in finding my brother.
^I believe he was taken as a slave to mine Beholderite.
^Oooo that's rough. Wait, I didn't think there were Beholderite mines anymore. I thought they were all outlawed.
^A man named Moke is running a secret operation. Still, it is difficult to keep an operation that big a secret.
^I think I might be able to find your brother. The problem is...
Iv_explains_past: ^I have trained my entire life to rid myself of worldly temptations. Beholderite simply does not phase me.
^Welcome aboard, then! Sadly, we can't start knocking skulls yet. Folkvar needs to ask daddy first.
Folkvar_talks_to_Iv: ^Well hello there, little lady! I hope you do not mind me saying but you look oddly out of place here!
^I am a monk from the mountains to the East. I am looking for help in finding my brother.
^I believe he was taken as a slave to mine Beholderite.
^By God! Excuse my language. Where do you think your brother was taken? By whom?
^I hear rumors of a man named Moke. The problem is, I have no idea where Moke's lair may be.
Folkvar_offers_Iv_help: ^I think I know where your brother is. We are going to the same place.
